name: Jacob Jazz´s Marley & Marley
description:
Your Future is a Horror Story Written by your Crimes!

My 2021 xmas horror short game gift! MARLEY & MARLEY.

Horrifying adaptation of Charles Dickens "Muppets A Christmas Carol"
Ebenezer Srooge on christmas eve when ghosts attacked him

BAH! HAMBUG!



Part of the game Tamarindos Freaking Dinner, created by Jacob Jazz under the Celery Emblem label.

published by Neon Doctrine 2022.
